mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kid_game(g_no, g_title, g_content, g_photo, g_flash) VALUES (MOM_GAME_NO.nextval, #{g_title}, #{g_content}, #{g_photo}, #{g_flash})
INSERT INTO kid_video(d_no, d_title, d_content, d_photo, d_video) VALUES (MOM_VIDEO_NO.nextval, #{d_title}, #{d_content}, #{d_photo}, #{d_video})
INSERT INTO kid_study(v_no, v_title, v_content, v_photo, v_video) VALUES (MOM_VIDEO_NO.nextval, #{v_title}, #{v_content}, #{v_photo}, #{v_video})
mapper.update: UPDATE kid_game SET g_count = g_count+1 WHERE g_no = #{g_no}
UPDATE kid_study SET v_count = v_count+1 WHERE v_no = #{v_no}
UPDATE kid_video SET d_count = d_count+1 WHERE d_no = #{d_no}
mapper.select: SELECT distinct regexp_substr(b.g_goodog, '[^/]+', 1, LEVEL) g_goodog FROM (SELECT g_goodog FROM kid_game WHERE g_no = #{g_no}) b CONNECT BY LEVEL <= length(regexp_replace(b.g_goodog, '[^/]+',''))+1
mapper.update: UPDATE kid_game SET g_good = (g_good+1), g_goodog = (g_goodog||'/'||#{g_recomId}) WHERE g_no = #{g_no}
